content: European Political Parties and European Political Foundations is responsible for registering, controlling and imposing sanctions, when required, on European political parties and European political foundations.EU joint undertakingChips Joint UndertakingThe Chips Joint Undertaking reinforces the EU’s strategic autonomy in the electronic components and systems sector.Websitehttps://www.chips-ju.europa.eu/Emailenquiries@chips-ju.europa.euPhone number00 32 2 221 81 02Address White Atrium Building  Avenue de la Toison d'Or/Guldenvlieslaan 56-60 1060 Bruxelles/Brussel Belgium EU joint undertakingCircular Bio-based Europe Joint Undertaking (CBE JU)The Circular Bio-based Europe Joint Undertaking works on advancing competitive bio-based industries in Europe.Websitehttps://www.cbe.europa.euAddressTO56 – 3rd floor 1049 Bruxelles/Brussel Belgium EU joint undertakingClean Aviation Joint UndertakingThe Clean Aviation Joint Undertaking develops innovative technologies to cut aircraft CO2 emissions
